column3:
â€œI just got some trinity kush delivered from westside organic. Suuuuper frosty, looks like a fucking snickerdoodle. This shit is BOMB. Not even halfway through vaping one bowl and i can already tell its the best weed i've ever had.

The effects are unlike any other kind of weed i've had yet. Every once in a while a weed comes along that feels completely different from all the rest, this one is it.

Its a very psyc...â€

â€œGot some Trinity Blueberry from Bridge City Collective.

I am in love with this strain. Soft and mellow euphoria, while being fully functional, not confused- actually focused. Took quite a while to fully come on- maybe half an hour? Very uplifting- I can see this being great for depression. Could also see this being a GREAT social strain.

I also think it helped with my knee pain. I definitely am not aware of it (the...â€

â€œTrinity was the Girl Scout Cookie or Gorilla Glue #4 of the 90's before the widowmaker herself, White Widow showed up on the scenes to devastate THC levels. Even after White Widow came through with all of her frosty popularity, Trinity was still a favorite among Pacific Northwest growers seeking the highest heights. Trinity is Master Kush x Afghan '76 and was developed by breeders in Northern California. Trinity quic...â€

â€œThis is by far the best strain I have ever had in almost 2 decades of smoking and being a connoisseur.  It's unique but skunky smell is so potent I only opened a jar in a bedroom to take a whif covertly in a hostile for cannabis home.  The jar was opened literally for like 1 second.  It permeated the whole house!  I had to flee my fascist Fathers GF as she called the cops.  Point being this cannabis is extreeeeeemly ...â€

â€œPicked this up in Portland a few times. Small compact flower. Very good for a day time medicine. It's a bit strong for the novice. Some tend to get a blissful night's rest as well. I always enjoy anything with hints of blueberry.â€
â€œSmoked over 100 strains and this is by far the best. X Special Forces Veteran, PTSD, Migrains, Depression, Pain, Anxiety, takes care of all these problems if its what u got.â€

â€œI've been smoking for 25 years, and I'm from Washington state, so I've had some really good buds in my time.  I picked up some Trinity from Pico Wellness in LA a couple of weeks ago because I was looking for a good Sativa strain.  The guys there were more into indicas, but I figured I'd give it a try anyway.  It turned out to be the right move. At this point in life, I have more of a need to get stuff done and mainta...â€

â€œI have PTSD & suffer from insomnia and nightmares/night terrors. Trinity not only helps me get to sleep, but my nightmares/terrors have also decreased drastically. Definitely good stuff if you have sleep issues.

If not?  You'll get hella baked. lol Pretty potent & last a decent amount of time...which is a really mellow high that'd be excellent for anxiety/panic and even depression. It's not so mellow that it bums ...â€

â€œI love Trinity.  It gives me energy, makes me happy and gives a great overall high without taking me over.  No anxiety at all which can be my big negative with some strains.  One of my favorites.â€

â€œim a straight sativa person cuz I love being uplifted n on the go n this hybrid Trinity strain is a GREAT sativa dominant.  It lifte me up and has me on the go which I love. And it helps out my low back muscle spasms from gettin to bad and lowering the pain. Great strain definitely worth the money.â€

â€œWow. I went to make a cup of coffee and it took me 3 or 4 trips to the kitchen as I kept forgetting about it. I was really into what I was researching and just kept forgetting.  I wanted to go out but decided it would be in my best interest not to drive for a while. I am impressed with the depth and length of the high. I don't want to call it a stone, but I sure enjoy it.â€

â€œOne of the finest strains I have tried. Big, dense buds. Awesome piney notes from the vaporizer. The buzz is uplifting yet relaxed, and definitely a creeper as other reviewers have said. Very nice synergy of indica vs. sativa effects. Wonderful relief from anxiety, yet I could still focus on my work.â€

â€œTrinity is an old school clone only variety that gained traction in Eugene OR. Named after the county were the original bag seed was scored, also known as TC. Surprisingly there is little to zero Sativa in this very squat wide leafed Indica variety. Once lost to generational cloning new stock has emerged from potentially tissue cultured stock. Seed breeders Hermetic Genetics are bringing back-crossed varietals to mar...â€
â€œNice sativa,  mellow yet uplifting and energetic. Not sure if I would use this for a daytime, does tend to have that sleepy feeling when coming down.â€

â€œI'm smoking on the Trinity Lavender sub-strain and I have to say it's one of the best smokes i've had in a while! Trinity offers a solid focused and almost psychedelic experience and lavender pulls it into a solid hybrid space that's not at all sleepy or couch glue. It feels more like getting out of a sauna, a mellow fresh and relaxed feeling all over your body. This strain stands out to me for good day time use, hik...â€

â€œIn the name of the Father, The Son, and the Holy Ghost, I think I met the new sativa of my dreams!  Tonite I picked up a Select Strains cartridge (my favorite brand) of Trinity, which tested at 76.90% THC 1.04% CBD . It tastes like NOTHING I've had before, like plum sake. In fact since I'm taking tomorrow off to be in my pool in the 90+ degree weather I'm going to go to the Asian grocery store 2 blocks from me to pic...â€

â€œI picked up an 1/8 of Trinity at a dispensary in Denver for the first time today. Smoked about a gram to myself and was pretty impressed. This is a very relaxing strain, and gives you a zoned out" feeling afterwards. I am a heavy smoker so I would definitely recommended this strain to anyone

â€œIn the name of the Father, The Son, and the Holy Ghost, I think I met the new sativa of my dreams! In fact since I'm taking tomorrow off to be in my pool in the 90+ degree weather I'm going to go to the Asian grocery store 2 blocks from me to pic...â€

â€œPowerful skunky smell, had me feeling like captain Kirk when he was getting blasted by warp core radiation, hand pressed against the glass in desperation and love for his friend Spock on the other side...â€
â€œWhenever I come across this fine strain, I make sure to pick up as much as possible! Overall, a definite five star bud.â€
â€œOMG This is the sh*t. Immediately feel the effects and your off to the races. Would not suggest using if you need to sleep. Anyways great stuff. Try it !â€
â€œAmazing strain! Got it in Boulder, CO. For sure one of my favorite flowers. Got to try it.â€
â€œGiggly. Visual.â€
â€œOMFG! NOW, THIS IS ALL I WANT! THIS STRAIN JUST RUINED IT FOR ALL OTHER STRAINS!â€
â€œTrinity is powerful and effective, but it has a tendency to make one cough a little more than usual.â€
â€œI love this stuff.  Very happy, uplifted good time.  A great strain to use when hanging out with friends.â€

â€œGreat for my wife's MS and the symptoms brought about by her medication. Kills pain, and relieves muscle spasm's but primarily alleviates nausea and provides appetite.
Very nice buzz, but a bit sleepy for a sativa.
Much more potent than most of the medical" strains
â€œI love this strain. It makes me very hyper and energetic. I smoke it on cleaning days because it makes me want to move around a lot.â€
â€œone of those legendary strains with enough of a skunk aroma to clear a room.. or lure everyone my way ;)â€

â€œI waited untill I was Sober to write this, thats a first. Ok, I got this Trinity from Mother Natures Remendy in Van Nuys Ca. My First reaction was OMFG!! WFT? Theres no way who ever grew this didnt do something to it. This is the best Cannibus I've ever had. If this is real the whole world will stop growing anything eccept Trinity. I've written many reviews in my time, but this is the only strain that I have found th...â€

â€œHas been a great help for crippling daytime pain from OA without knocking me out!  I don't feel it right away, but when it kicks in, my day is a lot more comfortable.  Unfortunately I've had some difficulty finding it available in Michiganâ€
â€œSolid strain. New top 10 strain for sure ! Very pretty nugs and tasted amazing. This strain makes me extremely hungry!â€
â€œI picked up the Trinity Skunk" from GTA Phoenix. A++ Long lasting
column5: euphoric but functional and clean. Clean buzz equals clean thoughts equals happiness!â€"

I actually went out and put up the xmas lights and then headed to work, so a pretty damn good strain.  The only flaw I have with it, is the taste, not bad, but nothing like the smell would indicate.  It is a bit peppery and hashy in fla...â€

â€œI smoked this strain almost exclusively for over 10 years when I lived in the Midwest. In college, I was in a community of connoisseurs so I tried many strains while I was exploring which ones I liked best. Once I came across Trinity, I knew I had found my #1 bud! As a musician and audio engineer, I liked this strain for its more cerebral than body buzz and I could stay focused throughout but still feel relaxed. I wo...â€
â€œTrinity is powerful and effective, but it has a tendency to make one cough a little more than usual.â€

â€œTrinity is a such a great strain. I rarely give any strain a 5 stars but this one had a bright, dark green with heavy orange hairs. It is rumored to be a rare strain, incredibly hard to find. This one just came to me naturally. Trinity is a such a smooth strain where you can just hit it and take a fat one, not even having to worry about coughing. It gives all nice head high and body too. Everything is evenly balanced...â€
â€œI love this strain. It makes me very hyper and energetic. I smoke it on cleaning days because it makes me want to move around a lot.â€

I actually went out and put up the xmas lights and then headed to work, so a pretty damn good strain.  The only flaw I have with it, is the taste, not bad, but nothing like the smell would indicate.  It is a bit peppery and hashy in fla...â€

This one just came to me naturally. Trinity is a such a smooth strain where you can just hit it and take a fat one, not even having to worry about coughing. It gives all nice head high and body too. Everything is evenly balanced...â€
â€œMy long-time favorite Sativa of choice. Trinity has a delicious flavor and what I choose to smoke during the earlier hours of my day.â€

â€œI'm in LOVE! This strain is simply INCREDIBLE... I love the euphoric head rush I get after smoking some. It's a great get up and go" strain; perfect for mornings. The most appealing thing about this strain for me however is that despite giving me a very strong
column5: arousing Sativa effect; I don't get any Anxiety or Paranoia! That's a MUST FOR ME; as I have an anxiety disorder which some strong Sativa strains...â€"

column3: â€œI feel relaxed and happy. No paranoia or negative thoughts. I find myself thinking very technical, like an item on TV (how was it made/the hours etc). The lighting in the TV show. I love this strain! My sore legs don't feel so sore anymore as well.â€
â€œPretty clear high, but also gives me a headache and a little nauseaâ€
â€œthis is one of the best strains I have ever hadâ€

â€œThis strain has me feeling relaxed and eating random munchies. It's a good strain to smoke after a long day of meetings, but keeps you pretty couch locked. :)

8 outta 10 #queerboisaysâ€

â€œThis is a good bedtime smoke, with a heavy smoke and leaving a heavy feeling in my chest. 

It worked well on muscle and nerve pain, although it did leave me forgetful and rather silent.â€
â€œSuper dank locked me into the couchâ€

â€œThis one hits like a good ol' Sativa for sure. Very pungent smell. Pine and mildly citrusy. The hit is extremely clean and not harsh at all. I packed my bowl to the max on quite a few hits and the exhale was still smooth. The high is the best part. Keeps you on top of things. No couch-lock at all. If you want to start your day and stay active, this is the strain for you. Wears off quickly though but def. a 5/5. Happy...â€

â€œTried as a preroll from Island. Smell is sweet and piney and heavy in the nose. Taste is interesting. Kind of a dirty pine with a strong sweet undertone coming in after and twisting the two flavors around in my mouth. Exhale is earthy and piney and the smoke is rather harsh.
The high surprised me, it was one of those â€œstoned before you know itâ€ experiences. An intense hybrid mixture that never overwhelms but glides b...â€

â€œBy FAR my favorite strain ever. Able to knock any heavy weight on their ass! A great uplifting energetic high that makes everything seem funny and great. Not easy to act sober on though, youâ€™ll definitely be able to tell someoneâ€™s high on this. I named my pipe â€œTrinityâ€ after this weed, for it holds a special place in my heart.â€
â€œNEW FAVE! makes life more fun :)â€

â€œUplifting. Very positive high, brings great vibes. Chest vibrations with negativity as it leaves you.

Stimulates interesting coversation. Little to no mind chatter. Awareness-raising. Intellectual. Fun, good for social circumstances.

Little to no paranoia.â€
â€œThe smell comes first-definitely a nice blueberry with the slight smell of skunk. It tastes as good as it smells. This may be my new favorite strain.â€

â€œTrinity is a favorite of mine. Another great evening strain to enjoy with friends, or partner. She is a nice, relaxing story telling strain. Helps with focus as well as pain relief. May act towards a 50/50 or indica Dom in some people. Over all this is an amazing strain.â€

â€œI had this strain earlier this year actually. But I'll never forget it. I had a couple 1g carts of the pure gold and the taste was astounding, very florial tasting with a nice uplifting head high that follows. I would outdoors and this strain just goes well for those who have a high tolerance and be activeâ€
â€œfucking brilliant. Wish it had more of a trippy feeling though.... maybe if i smoke more... *leaves and is never seen again*â€

â€œWhere or where is the Trinity! Only had it for a short time and have been looking for it for years. One of the best anywhere. All around classic cannabis strain. The GSC reminds me of Trinity. Just awesome!!!â€
â€œVery smooth smoke with a long lasting hi. Makes you feel good and does a great job at mitigating pain. Highly recommended.â€
â€œHard to find strain, but not really worth digging around too hard for. Good high, but not the best high.â€

â€œThis is a good bedtime smoke, with a heavy smoke and leaving a heavy feeling in my chest. 

It worked well on muscle and nerve pain, although it did leave me forgetful and rather silent.â€
â€œmellow and upliftingâ€
â€œlove this sativa! made me feel a little buzz but yet actually helped me feel more focused and sharp!â€
â€œDefinitely One of my favorites.â€

â€œ60% Sativa & 40% Indica

I enjoyed this strain. I thought it was smooth to smoke and tasty as well. The high was happy and relaxing, I felt calm, and had a good body buzz.â€
â€œExcellent flavor! Great high! My favorite sativa.â€
â€œA very kushy earthy tasting strain, high THC content decent CBD amount, incredible euphoric sativa high with a bit of sedation, very potent and hard to find, this is a connoisseur's dream.â€

â€œSmooth and top shelf product if grown and cured right. Hard to find original strain so watch for imposters should be lime green in color with excessive amout of trichromes and strong noncitrus smell.â€

â€œHaven't been journaling since I've been ill. Came highly recommend by the budtender. Did not disappoint; I would recommend this strain as well. Body high dang near perfect & head high enough to keep me comfortable but NO ANXIETY/PARANOIA (a must for me). Taste piney & blueberry like. Effects last bout 3 hours which I have found is typical amoung most strains I've tried since getting my card in 9/2013. Highly recommen...â€
â€œNew number one strain for my list period!â€

â€œtrinity grown right can be some of the best sativa around.. But alot of it I personally find isn't thick and coated in crystals like this one is.. and this is Outdoor! all in all this strain is great for happiness, true euphoria and just putting you in that social mood :)â€

â€œThis being all around Portland now I found this plant to be caked and pungent,  Te high for me was a good pain relief and created a plane for my mind to wander, my eyes seem to blur a little. I dig this strain but it's a home smoke free me.â€
â€œThis strain put me on my ass. Cleared the sins and demons out my body and soul. This shit purified me. Excellent strain I'd suggest a bong for the best high.â€
â€œI started growing this strain over a decade ago. It's easy to grow and effective. Not worth searching for, though.â€
â€œThis is the perfect daytime strain for me. It keeps me energized, positive, calm and focused.â€

â€œI had to reload on sativa and I wanted to try something new, the budtender told me this was a great daytime strain and the THC level was where I wanted to be. When he showed me the jar it was the end of the run and it was just small shotgun sized nugs. According to him this was how it grew out and YES sometimes weed does grow like this.

Needless to say it was dry as a bone but has some frost on the flower looking at...â€
â€œLoved this! Relaxing, but at same time, I could get stuff done during the day, and then some. But at the same time, relaxed me enough that I could sleep later.â€

â€œWasn'tbad,but also wasn't great neither. Didn't really do much for me. Could have just been my source? . Taste was bland, smell was a tad woody or dirtish, nothing crazy. High was. Mild,  good day strain if you don't want to be BAKED. Even the munchies where mild on this one, Lol ğŸ˜”. But overall  I personally wouldn't get this again,  maybe a G of flower? ?â€

â€œIt is probably one of the danker Sativas out there. It gave me a nice relaxed high, and not too over the top to put me on a cough lock. Overall a good medicinal high!â€

â€œLong time one of my favorite Sativa's! Remember getting it in Eugene in the early 2000's all the time. Was some of the Dankest bud I had ever seen back then! Great head high! Very Pungent! Gotta check Trinity out if you haven't already!â€

â€œEven >5 stars if you find a good batch.  It's been a couple of years (2014) since I've found that in Portland OR area.   Good Trinity is about the best most uplifting smoke I've had in 45 years of cannabinoid receptor stroking.  
Heartily endorse this strain when well-producedâ€

column4: we determined. Its effects are excellent
column5: just like one is placed into an HD movie.. full of fun and adventure. Enough of a body high to let one know but nothing anywhere n...â€"

column3: â€œThis strain did give me mild munchies.â€

â€œDestroys migraines like no other strain. I find that any kind of bud is a good migraine prophylactic (regular use keeps them away for the most part, but I can still succumb to food triggers), but Trinity is particularly good for stopping them once they've started. Great for creativity and writing too.â€

â€œBeen patiently waiting for a ....  I finally had this Trinity and yes only 10 mins in thank The Father, The Son and The Holy Ghost ... or your trinity of choice. 

I mean it's a lot going on in my life. I've had so many close people pass on in the last 6 months (that means death). But this morning I'm in a good mood. 

It happend I'm feeling glad, I got sunshine in a bag :)

Definitely feeling stress free, good mood,...â€
â€œMade me feel real heavy like I was lugging a tractor tire behind me. I was really expecting more out of this strainâ€
â€œIts worth its stars, this sativa dominant hybrid is a perfect high and it can be found at the Cannabis Care Wellness Center in fort collins.â€
â€œA nice find.  Clear focus and confidence is what this strain brings forth.â€
â€œThis is a great energizing and uplifting sativa strain. Great for the morning however may induce some anxiety; so take it slow and easy, especially with concentrates.â€
â€œI LOVE this strain. Such a good high. Always great when my local shop has pre rollsâ€
â€œmy favorite strain by far. found it on accident. it was very euphoric with still having a focus mind. I would recommend  this to anyone that wants to be amazed how well balanced the high is.â€
â€œThe Bake Shop was providing this strain for 10 bucks a gram or 15 for 2 grams. It's a good deal. It tastes a little rough but it's a solid day time/productive weed.â€
â€œNice surprise to come across this strain. Nice sativa.â€

â€œDid not @ all enjoy the experience. Which was a bummer cuz I always enjoy the meds from this dispensary. Did not @ all help with my migraine; actually made it worse. Helped with nausea. Obviously still stressed cuz I was still in pain. Head high nice but not too strong. Nice, clean piney vape. Will not be getting this strain again. :-(â€
â€œTrinity is a high CBD strain. Thc content kept to minimal lvlsâ€

â€œCompletely ignore the first review I wrote, I CLEARLY confused this with Harlequin.  Trinity was a big disappointment.  Nothing distinguishing or special about this strain at all.  Will NEVER buy again.â€
